entities.name: ukeoi_keiyakuNewtmp_kihonForm
entities.content:
# Validation Form ## 1. Form Configuration - **Form name**: `ukeoi_keiyakuNewtmp_kihonForm` - **Action mapping**: `/kihonTabDispatch` - **Action class**: `jp.co.daiwahouse.dsmart.application.contract.ukeoi.keiyakuNewtmp.kihon.KihonTabDispatchAction` - **Validation file**: `src/webapp/dsmart/WEB-INF/config/contract/ukeoi/validation.xml` - **Struts config**: `src/webapp/dsmart/WEB-INF/config/contract/ukeoi/struts-config.xml` ## 2. Field-Specific Validation Rules | Screen Block | Label | Property | Validation Rules | Error Message Key | |--------------|-------|----------|------------------|-------------------| | **JH03 Header Screen** | Order Sales Office | `JH03_jyutyuEigyousyoName` | **Required Field**: Required, cannot be empty | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.jyutyuEigyousyo`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Sales Office | `JH03_uriageEigyousyoName` | **Required Field**: Required, cannot be empty | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.uriageEigyousyo`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Sales Representative | `JH03_eigyouUserName` | **Required Field**: Required, cannot be empty | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.eigyouTantousya`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | | Contract Category | `JH03_keiyakuKbnCd` | **Required Field**: Required, cannot be empty | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.keiyakuKubun`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput` | | **Contract Customer Block** | Joint Name Edit | `J0001_keiyakuKokyakuName` | **Max Byte Size (200)**: Max 200 bytes
**Non Hankaku Kana**: No half-width kana allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `＜Contract Party＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `200`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `＜Contract Party＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | | **Building Owner Block** | Joint Name Edit | `J0002_sesyuKokyakuName` | **Max Byte Size (200)**: Max 200 bytes
**Non Hankaku Kana**: No half-width kana allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `＜Building Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `200`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `＜Building Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | | **Land Owner Block** | Joint Name Edit | `J0003_sikichiSyoyusyaName` | **Max Byte Size (200)**: Max 200 bytes
**Non Hankaku Kana**: No half-width kana allowed | **MaxByteSize**:
• arg0: `＜Land Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize`
• arg1: `200`

**NonHankakuKana**:
• arg0: `＜Land Owner＞Joint Name Edit`
• message: `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | | **J0004 Construction Name Screen** | Name | `J0004_koujiBukkenName` | **Required Field**: Required
**Zenkaku**: Only full-width characters allowed | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyou`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput`

**Zenkaku**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyou`
• message: `common.error.zenkaku` | | | Name Kana | `J0004_koujiBukkenNameKana` | **Required Field**: Required
**Zenkaku**: Only full-width characters allowed
**Mask Pattern**: Must match predefined pattern | **Required**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyouKana`
• message: `contract.error.requiredInput`

**Zenkaku**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.meisyouKana`
• message: `common.error.zenkaku`

**Mask**:
• message: `contract.error.nameKanaCheck`
• pattern: `^[!-@　！-＠ァ-ーＡ-Ｚａ-ｚ]+$` | | | Building Coverage Ratio | `J0004_kenpeiRitsu` | **Float**: Numeric
**Max Byte Size (6)**: 6 bytes limit
**Integer Size (3)**: Integer part max 3 digits
**Float Dec Size (2)**: Decimal part max 2 digits | **Float**:
• message: `common.error.numeric`
• arg0: `contract.common.param.kenpeiRitsu`

**IntegerSize**:
• arg1: `3`
• message: `common.error.numericSize`

**FloatDecSize**:

• message: `common.error.numericSize`

**MaxByteSize**:

• message: `common.error.maxByteSize` | | | Floor Area Ratio | `J0004_yousekiRitsu` | **Float**: Numeric
**Max Byte Size (7)**: 7 bytes limit
**Integer Size (4)**: Integer part max 4 digits
**Float Dec Size (2)**: Decimal part max 2 digits | **Float**:
• message: `common.error.numeric`
• arg0: `contract.common.param.yousekiRitsu`

**IntegerSize**:
• arg1: `4`
• message: `common.error.numericSize`

**FloatDecSize**:
• arg1: `2`
• message: `common.error.numericSize`

**MaxByteSize**:
• arg1: `7`
• message: `common.error.maxByteSize` | | | Land Price (Market Price) | `J0004_jisseiTochiKakaku` | **Integer**: Integer
**Integer Size (13)**: Max 13 digits
**Long Range**: 0 to 9999999999999 | **Integer**:
• arg0: `contract.common.param.tochitsubotanka`

**IntegerSize**:
• arg1: `13`
• message: `common.error.numericSize`

**LongRange**:
• min: `0`
• max: `9999999999999`
• message: `contract.common.error.rangeNoneFromTo` | ### 2.1 Message Reference Table #### 2.1.1 Field Name Messages (arg values) | Argument Key | Argument Message | |-------------|----------------| | `contract.common.param.jyutyuEigyousyo` | Order Sales Office | | `contract.common.param.uriageEigyousyo` | Sales Office | | `contract.common.param.eigyouTantousya` | Sales Representative | | `contract.common.param.keiyakuKubun` | Contract Category | | `contract.common.param.meisyou` | Name | | `contract.common.param.meisyouKana` | Name Kana | | `contract.common.param.kenpeiRitsu` | Building Coverage Ratio | | `contract.common.param.yousekiRitsu` | Floor Area Ratio | | `contract.common.param.tochitsubotanka` | Land Price per Tsubo | #### 2.1.2 Validation Error Messages | Message Key | Actual Message | |-------------|----------------| | `contract.error.requiredInput` | {0} must be entered. | | `common.error.zenkaku` | Please enter {0} in full-width characters. | | `common.error.maxByteSize` | Please enter {0} within {1} bytes. (Full-width/line break=2 bytes, half-width=1 byte) | | `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | For {0}, please enter characters other than half-width kana. | | `contract.error.nameKanaCheck` | For Name Kana, please enter full-width kana, symbols, or numbers. | | `common.error.numeric` | Please enter {0} as a numeric value. | | `common.error.numericSize` | Please enter {0} with {1} digits or less. | | `contract.common.error.rangeNoneFromTo` | Please enter {0} in the range from {1} to {2}. | ## 3. Validation Process Flow ### 3.1 Overall Validation Flow ```mermaid graph TD A[Form Submission] --> B[comIsFirstSubmit Check] B --> C{First submission?} C -->|No| D[Cancel submission] C -->|Yes| E[KihonTabDispatchAction] E --> F[Validation.xml Check] F --> G{Required fields OK?} G -->|No| H[Display error message] G -->|Yes| I[Format validation] I -->|No| J[Display format error] I -->|Yes| K[Business rule validation] K --> L{Business rules OK?} L -->|No| M[Display business error] L -->|Yes| N[Action processing] ``` ### 3.2 JavaScript Validation Flow ```mermaid flowchart TD A[User Input] --> B[Field validation function] B --> C{Data type OK?} C -->|No| D[Display field error] C -->|Yes| E[Format validation] E --> F{Format OK?} F -->|No| G[Display format error] F -->|Yes| H[Business logic check] H --> I{Business rules OK?} I -->|No| J[Display business error] I -->|Yes| K[Allow form submission] ``` ### 3.3 Error Handling Flow ```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant User as User participant JS as JavaScript participant Form as HTML Form participant Action as Struts Action participant Validation as Validation.xml participant Service as Business Service User->>JS: Form submission JS->>JS: comIsFirstSubmit() JS->>JS: Field validation JS->>Form: Submit if OK Form->>Action: HTTP Request Action->>Validation: Check validation rules Validation-->>Action: Validation result Action->>Service: Process if OK Service-->>Action: Business process result Action-->>Form: Forward/Redirect Form-->>User: Display result ``` ## 4. JavaScript Validation Functions | No. | Function Name | Validation Type | Error Message | Trigger Condition | |-----|---------------|-----------------|---------------|-------------------| | 1 | `comIsFirstSubmit()` | Prevent multiple submissions | "Already submitted" | Prevent multiple submissions | | 2 | `cntCheckIntegerPositive(obj)` | Positive integer validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in positive integer field | | 3 | `cntCheckInteger(obj)` | Integer validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in integer field | | 4 | `cntCheckNumber(obj)` | Numeric validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in numeric field | | 5 | `cntCheckIntegerPositiveRequired(obj)` | Required positive integer | "Must be entered" | Required positive integer is empty | | 6 | `cntCheckIntegerRequired(obj)` | Required integer | "Must be entered" | Required integer is empty | | 7 | `cntCheckNumberRequired(obj)` | Required numeric | "Must be entered" | Required numeric is empty | | 8 | `cntChkLeaveKhnTab(form)` | Tab exit validation | "For new creation, please press the register button" | Attempting to leave tab without registering | | 9 | `cntChkLeaveTCTab(form)` | Tab exit validation | "For new creation, please press the register button" | Attempting to leave tab without registering | | 10 | `cntChkGijyutsusyaHaichi(form)` | Technical staff placement check | "Building Standards Act application: Target has been selected. Please register the 'This Contract' technical staff placement button." | Insufficient technical staff placement | | 11 | `printKeiyakuInsatsuChk(msgFlg,mode)` | Contract printing check | Print confirmation dialog | Contract print request | | 12 | `cntDfcGokeiyakusyaCardOutputKakunin()` | DFC card output confirmation | DFC output successful | DFC output request |

entities.name: Validation Error Messages
entities.content:
| Message Key | Actual Message |

| `contract.error.requiredInput` | {0} must be entered. |
| `common.error.zenkaku` | Please enter {0} in full-width characters. |
| `common.error.maxByteSize` | Please enter {0} within {1} bytes. (Full-width/line break=2 bytes, half-width=1 byte) |
| `common.error.nonHankakuKana` | For {0}, please enter characters other than half-width kana. |
| `contract.error.nameKanaCheck` | For Name Kana, please enter full-width kana, symbols, or numbers. |
| `common.error.numeric` | Please enter {0} as a numeric value. |
| `common.error.numericSize` | Please enter {0} with {1} digits or less. |
| `contract.common.error.rangeNoneFromTo` | Please enter {0} in the range from {1} to {2}. |

entities.name: Overall Validation Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Form Submission] --> B[comIsFirstSubmit Check]
    B --> C{First submission?}
    C -->|No| D[Cancel submission]
    C -->|Yes| E[KihonTabDispatchAction]
    E --> F[Validation.xml Check]
    F --> G{Required fields OK?}
    G -->|No| H[Display error message]
    G -->|Yes| I[Format validation]
    I -->|No| J[Display format error]
    I -->|Yes| K[Business rule validation]
    K --> L{Business rules OK?}
    L -->|No| M[Display business error]
    L -->|Yes| N[Action processing]
```

entities.name: JavaScript Validation Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
flowchart TD
    A[User Input] --> B[Field validation function]
    B --> C{Data type OK?}
    C -->|No| D[Display field error]
    C -->|Yes| E[Format validation]
    E --> F{Format OK?}
    F -->|No| G[Display format error]
    F -->|Yes| H[Business logic check]
    H --> I{Business rules OK?}
    I -->|No| J[Display business error]
    I -->|Yes| K[Allow form submission]
```

entities.name: Error Handling Flow
entities.content:
```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant User as User
    participant JS as JavaScript
    participant Form as HTML Form
    participant Action as Struts Action
    participant Validation as Validation.xml
    participant Service as Business Service
    
    User->>JS: Form submission
    JS->>JS: comIsFirstSubmit()
    JS->>JS: Field validation
    JS->>Form: Submit if OK
    Form->>Action: HTTP Request
    Action->>Validation: Check validation rules
    Validation-->>Action: Validation result
    Action->>Service: Process if OK
    Service-->>Action: Business process result
    Action-->>Form: Forward/Redirect
    Form-->>User: Display result
```

entities.name: JavaScript Validation Functions
entities.content:
| No. | Function Name | Validation Type | Error Message | Trigger Condition |
|-----|---------------|-----------------|---------------|-------------------|
| 1 | `comIsFirstSubmit()` | Prevent multiple submissions | "Already submitted" | Prevent multiple submissions |
| 2 | `cntCheckIntegerPositive(obj)` | Positive integer validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in positive integer field |
| 3 | `cntCheckInteger(obj)` | Integer validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in integer field |
| 4 | `cntCheckNumber(obj)` | Numeric validation | "Please enter a numeric value" | Non-numeric input in numeric field |
| 5 | `cntCheckIntegerPositiveRequired(obj)` | Required positive integer | "Must be entered" | Required positive integer is empty |
| 6 | `cntCheckIntegerRequired(obj)` | Required integer | "Must be entered" | Required integer is empty |
| 7 | `cntCheckNumberRequired(obj)` | Required numeric | "Must be entered" | Required numeric is empty |
| 8 | `cntChkLeaveKhnTab(form)` | Tab exit validation | "For new creation, please press the register button" | Attempting to leave tab without registering |
| 9 | `cntChkLeaveTCTab(form)` | Tab exit validation | "For new creation, please press the register button" | Attempting to leave tab without registering |
| 10 | `cntChkGijyutsusyaHaichi(form)` | Technical staff placement check | "Building Standards Act application: Target has been selected. Please register the 'This Contract' technical staff placement button." | Insufficient technical staff placement |
| 11 | `printKeiyakuInsatsuChk(msgFlg,mode)` | Contract printing check | Print confirmation dialog | Contract print request |
| 12 | `cntDfcGokeiyakusyaCardOutputKakunin()` | DFC card output confirmation | DFC output successful | DFC output request |
